Concord.Cannon School: Cannon School an independent, nonsectarian, college preparatory institution serving students in junior kindergarten through grade 12. The school enrolls approximately 900 students for the 2012–2013 school year. Cannon School is located in Concord, North Carolina in Cabarrus County, on a 65-acre (26 ha) campus on Poplar Tent Road near the Cabarrus/Mecklenburg county line.
